00037 
00038  PROGRAM main
00039 
00040 ! Common Variables
00041  USE NTypes
00042  USE Domain
00043  USE FluidParams
00044  USE MPIParams
00045  USE MPI
00046  IMPLICIT NONE
00047 
00048 ! Local variables
00049  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR
00050 
00051 
00052 ! Initialize MPI environment
00053  CALL MPI_INIT(MPI_ERR)
00054  CALL MPI_COMM_SIZE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, nprocs, MPI_ERR)
00055  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_WORLD, proc, MPI_ERR)
00056 
00057 ! Read input parameters, broadcast them and create virtual CPU grid
00058  CALL Parameters
00059  CALL VGrid
00060 
00061 ! Allocate memory for common arrays and initialize
00062  CALL MemAlloc(1)
00063  CALL Init
00064 
00065 ! Main Loop
00066  DO iStep = 1, MaxStep
00067 
00068 ! Half momentum step
00069    CALL PreStreamG
00070    CALL MPI_UpdateG
00071 
00072 ! Order parameter step 1
00073    CALL PreStreamF
00074    CALL MPI_UpdateF
00075    CALL MPI_UpdateRhoF
00076    CALL HydrodynamicsF
00077    CALL PostStreamF
00078 
00079 ! Half order parameter step 2
00080    CALL PreStreamF
00081    CALL MPI_UpdateF
00082    CALL MPI_UpdateRhoF
00083    CALL HydrodynamicsF
00084 
00085 ! Perform interpolation and calculate velocity and pressure
00086    CALL UpdateG
00087    CALL MPI_UpdateRhoG
00088    CALL HydrodynamicsG
00089    CALL MPI_UpdateHydro
00090    CALL UpdateF
00091 
00092 ! Complete order parameter step 2 and momentum step
00093    CALL PostStreamG
00094    CALL PostStreamF
00095 
00096 ! Save data if necessary
00097    IF (MOD(iStep,tStat) == 0) CALL Stats
00098    IF (MOD(iStep,tDump) == 0) CALL VtkPlane
00099 
00100 ! Test pressure convergence
00101    IF ( eps <= pConv ) EXIT
00102 
00103  END DO
00104  RelaxStep = iStep - 1
00105 
00106 ! Save final data
00107  CALL FinalDump
00108  CALL VtkPlane
00109 
00110 ! Free memory, finalize MPI communication, and end program
00111  CALL MemAlloc(2)
00112  CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00113 
00114  END PROGRAM
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
